name: Tight Theme
description: Information-dense modern design with proper image support

classes.body_classes: font-system bg-bg-gray text-text-dark leading-normal text-base m-0 p-0
classes.header_classes: bg-white border-b border-border-color shadow-sm sticky top-0 z-50
classes.header_container_classes: max-w-container mx-auto px-6 py-4 flex items-center gap-8
classes.nav_link_classes: text-text-gray no-underline font-medium text-base hover:text-primary transition-colors duration-200
classes.hero_classes: py-8 text-center bg-white my-4 rounded-xl shadow-sm
classes.section_title_classes: text-2xl font-normal text-text-dark mb-1 flex items-center gap-3
classes.news_card_classes: bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm grid md:grid-cols-[160px_1fr] hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 news-card-mobile
classes.news_image_classes: image-base image-rectangle flex items-center justify-center text-white font-bold text-sm tracking-wide news-image-mobile
classes.news_image_text_classes: bg-black/60 px-3 py-1 rounded text-xs font-bold tracking-wide
classes.card_classes: bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200
classes.card_image_classes: image-base image-square flex items-center justify-center text-white font-bold text-sm tracking-wide
classes.button_classes: bg-primary text-white border-none py-2 px-6 rounded-lg text-sm font-semibold cursor-pointer transition-all duration-200 mt-4 hover:bg-blue-700 hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-md hover:shadow-primary/25
